casebody.data:
SLOK, LLC
v.
COURTSIDE CONDOMINIUM OWNERS ASSOCIATION, INC. No. 193P19 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Madeline J. Trilling, Attorney at Law, Concord, for Slok, LLC. Michelle Massingale Dressler, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Courtside Condominium Owners Association, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd of May 2019 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
